body:
I've added a `requests` prop to the `LoadingOverlay` component, which accepts one or more request ID's and shows the overlay accordingly. I've swapped out the `Simple` overlays with `request` props elsewhere, too.

I really like the idea of being able to target the request we're waiting on, though I'm unsure of how maintainable using string ID's will be. For instance, the recipe listing page needs to do a bit of data handling before it knows what the actual request ID is (cause filters) - if that code changes in one spot and not the other, our LoadingOverlay will malfunction.

I don't know if this is the PR to address it, but we may want to brainstorm a more scalable solution to fetching request ID's.
